short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spend 10x less time writing emails - Redraft is a GPT writing assistant that drafts emails in your tone of voice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redraft is designed to write emails the way you would write them. Every time you open a new email, Redraft will write a first draft for you.
